item.title: This Simple Trick Will Let You Turn Off Your Android Phone With a Broken Screen!
item.description: Introduction Have you ever had a broken Android phone, only to realize that you can’t turn it off? Or maybe you just don’t have the money to get it fixed? If so, you’re in luck! This simple trick will allow you to turn off your Android phone with a broken screen. Overview of the Trick This trick involves using a computer to access your Android phone’s settings, and then using a series of commands to turn off the phone.
